about_the_game:
The Goblins of Elderstone original soundtrack is a collection of beautifully orchestrated music tracks from the city-building Goblin tribe simulator. Composed by the ever-talented HyperDuck SoundWorks studio and features additional music by our very own award-winning Bart Klepka.

Take a musical journey into the world of Elderstone, from the perspective of the Goblins. Experience the calm and relaxing sounds of the seasons, the upbeat movements of the working tribe, the ethereal whispers of the gods, and the various encounters a Goblin will ultimately run into.

Take a musical journey into the world of Elderstone, from the perspective of the Goblins. Experience the calm and relaxing sounds of the seasons, the upbeat movements of the working tribe, the ethereal whispers of the gods, and the various encounters a Goblin will ultimately run into.
